alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 8:57PM EDT until March 16 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... White River at Hazleton. Wabash River from Riverton to Mount Carmel. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southwestern Indiana. Flooding is expected to continue on the lower White into Tuesday and along the Wabash into Thursday. River levels are falling along both rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Extensive flooding is in progress. Higher rural roads begin to flood. High water isolates many river cabins. Seep water becomes a problem. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Monday /8:00 PM EDT Monday/ the stage was 19.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Monday /8:00 PM EDT Monday/ was 20.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 8.0 feet Thursday, March 23. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by Tuesday afternoon.
